sample

Class Shield

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Shield

  • public class Shield
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for the creation of a Shield. It is Active for 10 seconds.

      • Shield

        public Shield(Start s)
        This is the constructor for the Shield. It sets the Shield Image and the size of the Shield (side = 30)

        Parameters:

      • isColliding

        public void isColliding(Snake snake)
        This method is used to check whether the Snake grabs the Shield or not. It checks the difference in the X Coordinates of both the Snake and the Shield. Based on that it determines whether collision takes place or not. If Collision takes place the Shield protects the snake from all the blocks that it collides with.
        Parameters:
        snake - It is the Main Snake of the Game.
